creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: 3/4 portrait of a standing man, holding a small book in his PL hand; long hair with curls above the ears; moustache; sketchy archway and foliage behind figure; empty panel below image (inside plate marks)
markings: on back: various stamps in black, blue and brown
provenance: Earl of Aylesford (London and Packington Hall, Warwickshire, Lugt 58); Hermann Weber (Bonn, Lugt 1383); Julian Marshall (London, Lugt 1494); Edward Smith, Jr. (London, Lugt 2897); Walter Francis Tiffen (Salisbury, Lugt 1051); Marsden Jasael Perry (Providence, RI, Lugt 1880); Marseille Holloway (London, Lugt 1875); André-Jean Hachette (Paris, Lugt 132); C. G. Boerner (New York); Bruce Dayton (Wayzata, MN)
title: Jan Antonides van der Linden
